title: Snowdown Hextech Crafting
body: Can the Snowdown exclusive chests be earned in-game or can they only be purchased with RP for the event?

replies.body: Snowdown chests will be available through the store and not in-game.  Any champion mastery chests you find or fuse through a gemstone will remain as the traditional, thawed hextech chest.  Hope that helps clear things up!

The legacy and Snowdown chests (glowing blue ones) are RP only.  Winter chests (the reskinned hextech chests) seem to be also RP only because I am only getting normal hextech chests from S ranks, although maybe it has to do with what game mode you are playing.
